description: Analyzes uploaded applicant documents, extracts key data, calculates risk score using predefined criteria, and generates underwriting recommendation with detailed rationale

example_response.key_findings: JSON string array of key findings from the analysis
example_response.document_verification: JSON string array of document verification statuses
example_response.risk_factors: JSON string array of identified risk factors with severity
example_response.recommendation_rationale: Detailed explanation for the underwriting recommendation
example_response.suggested_conditions: Any special conditions or requirements if approved
